entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, -15.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Thunder Bay Airport 9:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 67 %

entry.title: Thursday night: A few clouds. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Clearing. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 30 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Sunny in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud with 40 percent chance of flurries late in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High minus 5. Wind chill minus 31 in the morning and minus 12 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow ending after midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Wind becoming west 30 gusting to 50 after midnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Thursday 16 February 2023
